message: Bob, I know you value every dollar—but if you wait until your turn, inflation will chew up your share by 10% each round. Accept this offer now and secure at least a sliver before it devalues to nothing.
Alice, considering the inflation, I'm being generous with this 60-40 split. It's better for both of us to settle now rather than losing value in further rounds.

Bob, if you reject, you’ll propose in Round 4—but by then your money is worth only 70% of its face value, letting you secure about $7000 in real terms. Accepting now, your $8750 becomes worth 80%—exactly $7000 effective dollars. It’s in both our interests to settle today.
